entry.title: CodingGit
entry.content: git config –global core.autocrlf false 用户信息配置git config –global user.name “zhouguang9” git config –global user.email “790840179@qq.com” 1.网络下载至新文件夹git clone https://git.coding.net/narisolar/apogee.git git branch zhouguang 新建本地分支zhouguang 2.网络下载项目并与本地项目合并git checkout master 切换至本地master git pull 将网络master拉至本地master git checkout zhouguang 切换至本地zhouguang 方案一：git push origin zhouguang:zhouguang 网络zhouguang没有建立，现在建立并上传本地zhouguang至网络zhouguang 方案二： //git pull git branch –set-upstream-to=origin/zhouguang zhouguang 本地zhouguang与远程zhouguang联系 git pull 将网络zhouguang拉至本地zhouguang git merge master 将本地master(已经将网络master拉下来的)与zhouguang合并 3.上传本地项目至网络分支zhouguanggit status 上传 git add . git commit -m “代码备注” git push origin zhouguang //origin是服务器zhouguang是分支 4.合并到网络分支mastergit checkout master git merge zhouguang git push

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
